data.oai_dc:dc: Transcriptomic data for O. maculosus and B. cirrhosis

Raw data of hybridization assays for both species of sculpin for all time-points at all O2 tensions. Available in ArrayExpress at http://www.ebi.ac.uk/arrayexpress/experiments/E-MTAB-3043/. When reusing these data, please include the following citation: Microarray data are available in the ArrayExpress database (www.ebi.ac.uk/arrayexpress) under accession number E-MTAB-3043.
